description: This file configures ESLint using the @eslint/eslintrc package with specific extensions for Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript.

methods.name: __filename
methods.description: Filename of the current module computed from import.meta.url

methods.name: __dirname
methods.description: Directory name of the current module

methods.name: compat
methods.description: Instance of FlatCompat used to handle ESLint config extensions
